attributes.action: Make my friend Harrisson William Tolhurst come home for the summer
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I have recently learnt that my mate Harrisson William Tolhurst is not coming home from university for the summer, this is a petition to get him back to Gnosall and out of Lancaster, for him to fulfill his duties to his friends. What else is Chris Green going to do for the summer?

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
